name: A Dark Dawn
description:
A Dark Dawn is an emotional story about a man who tries to find again the love of his life.

The game uses graphics, music and text to create a never before seen thrilling experience.

You may even learn a life lesson or two.

Actually this was made for FuckThisJam and should not be taken seriously. Since there isn't really a genre that I fully hate, I made a little satire of those "deep" games you sometimes see on retsufrash :)

Linux people might wanna click on this text

Or if you want the source code, click here
